title: New York Gets Aggressive, Big Low-Key Moves, and Lessons of Free Agency | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 248)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark break down the huge trade between the New York Jets and Indianapolis Colts (05:00), how it affects the Denver Broncos and the Buffalo Bills (16:00), and the impact it will have on the draft (24:00). Then they discuss some of the most important under-the-radar free-agent signings (29:30) before they each share their three lessons learned from this year's signings (41:45).

Read our NFL free-agency coverage here: https://www.theringer.com/nfl
